name: Bain & Company
tagline: Results-driven MBB firm—built on PE expertise and Results Delivery®
description: Bain & Company is a global consultancy that helps the world's most ambitious change makers define the future. Across 65 cities in 40 countries, we work alongside our clients as one team with a shared ambition to achieve extraordinary results, outperform the competition, and redefine industries. We complement our tailored, integrated expertise with a vibrant ecosystem of digital innovators to deliver better, faster, and more enduring outcomes. Our 10-year commitment to invest more than $1 billion in pro bono services brings our talent, expertise, and insight to organizations tackling today's urgent challenges in education, racial equity, social justice, economic development, and the environment. We earned a platinum rating from EcoVadis, the leading platform for environmental, social, and ethical performance ratings for global supply chains, putting us in the top 1% of all companies. Since our founding in 1973, we have measured our success by the success of our clients, and we proudly maintain the highest level of client
known_for: Founded by BCG partners in 1973 with a revolutionary focus on delivering results, not just recommendations. Dominates private equity consulting (serves 75%+ of global PE firms) and pioneered the Results Delivery® methodology. Known for strong culture, entrepreneurial spirit, and unmatched client loyalty through outcome-based engagement model.
career_path: Associate Consultant (2-3 yrs) → Senior Associate Consultant (1-2 yrs) → Consultant (2-3 yrs) → Case Team Leader (2-3 yrs) → Manager (2-3 yrs) → Principal (3-4 yrs) → Partner

recruiting.process: Application → Testing (aptitude + psychometric) → Phone/Video Screen (20 min behavioral) → First Round (2 case interviews, 40 min each) → Final Round (2 case interviews, 40 min each)
recruiting.unique: Required aptitude assessment testing logical reasoning and math, plus psychometric evaluation for culture fit. Candidate-led case format (like BCG). Highly competitive 1-2% acceptance rate. Process takes 4-6 weeks total with ~14 days between stages.
recruiting.timeline: Applications open July, close September-November (varies by school). Submit 4-5 days before deadline. First rounds in fall, offers by late fall/early winter. Earlier deadlines than prior years.

byu.tip: Strong BYU presence with 54+ current alumni. Network early with Bain's MBA and undergraduate recruiting teams. Consider offices in SF, Seattle, and LA for West Coast proximity.
